Crypto

A class to make it easy to use the rest of the framework.  As a side-effect, using this class will cause most of the framework to be linked into your application, which is not always what you want.

If you want to optimize your download size, don’t use this class.  (But feel free to read it to get ideas on how to get the algorithm you want.)

Summary
